column4: does anybody know of a good program to convert between mp3, ogg and wav?
i was trying that, but i couldn't seem to get it to convert from mp3 to wav
it explains the process (including examples) far better than I could
i tried this: gst-launch-0.8 filesrc=13982.mp3 ! mad ! waveenc ! filesink location=test.wav
i think it didn't like the waveenc
i also tried wavenc... but i don't which one to put there
it will probably be something like um... $ gst-launch-0.8 filesrc location=file.mp3 ! spider ! vorbisenc ! filesink location=file.ogg
but i want wav as output
did that give you any errors?
looks right to me, let me test it
ERROR: pipeline could not be constructed: Unrecoverable syntax error
try using spider instead of mad
yeah, odd it's bailing out for me too for some reason
oh yeah, oops... it's not filesrc=, it's filesrc location=
